1.1.0.name: wordpress/templatedia
1.1.0.description:
Do you find yourself constantly copying and pasting code from post to post or from page to page? Well then this plugin may be exactly what you were looking for.

Templatedia allows you to create dynamic templates and then insert small tags into posts and pages that will be replaced with the template. It's template system is based on that of MediaWiki, the software behind Wikipedia.

Some Possible Usages

  • A styled download box that contains information about the latest version of a file and a link to download
  • Adding a Digg button to a post or page
  • Easily adding differently styled boxes of text or images
  • ... and countless other things!

See Also

  • Templatedia Chess: an addon for this plugin that adds a new
